dataRoles.name: col_0
dataRoles.description: Fields to put on the horizontal axis

dataRoles.name: col_5
dataRoles.description: Map the field based on which you want the conditional color on First Value column

dataRoles.name: col_6
dataRoles.description: Map the field based on which you want the conditional color on Second Value column

dataRoles.name: col_7
dataRoles.description: Map the field based on which you want the conditional color on Third Value column

dataRoles.name: col_3
dataRoles.description: Add additional fields that people can see in the tooltip when they hover over on part of this visualization

companyName.description: Name of the company or person to which license is issued

expirationDate.description: Your license is valid till given date (YYYY-MM-DD)

sorts.description: Stores sort definitions defined in sorting dialog

displayToolbar.description: Determines toolbar should be displayed or not when user is editing report.

scroll.description: Determine scroll behavior of the chart

position.description: Select the location of the Legend

title.description: Display a title on legend symbols

direction.description: Small multiple charts should draw from left to right OR from top to bottom.

pointCount.description: When the direction is Left to right, these are the maximum columns that can come. For Top to bottom these are maximum rows

coupleXAxis.description: Show only Bottom X Axis and hide rest of the X Axis

coupleYAxis.description: Show only Left Y Axis and hide rest of the Y Axis

matchXRange.description: Make all x axis ranges same

matchYRange.description: Make all y axis ranges same

show.description: Show/hide axis, it's line and axis labels altogether

axisRangeType.description: Define axis data type. Choose 'Auto' to select automatically.

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

canZoom.description: Allow user to zoom axis. To zoom, click mouse left button and drag it in the direction of axis. To reset, double click on chart area.

showDivider.description: Show/hide dividers among multi-categories. Applicable only when axis type is Multi-category.

color.description: Determines color of axis. Color of labels can be overridden.

isAxisLabelAngleCustom.description: True to manually set axis label angle

axisLabelAngle.description: Define axis label angle. It can be from -90 to 90. To draw labels vertically, choose 90

axisLabelPrefix.description: Prefix will be added before the axis label.

axisLabelSuffix.description: Suffix will be added after axis label.

concatenateLabels.description:
Text that will be used to join axis labels. It is applicable only when there are multiple attributes on the axis and they are joined. example:
, etc.

concatenateOrderReverse.description: Order of joining should be reversed or in the order they are provided

titleText.description: Text to display as title. Leave blank to compute automatically.

show.description: Show/hide axis, it's line and axis labels altogether

showLine.description: Show/hide axis line. This keeps labels intact

canZoom.description: Allow user to zoom axis. To zoom, click mouse left button and drag it in the direction of axis. To reset, double click on chart area.

isAxisLabelAngleCustom.description: True to manually set axis label angle

axisLabelAngle.description: Define axis label angle. It can be from -90 to 90. To draw labels vertically, choose 90

axisLabelFormat.description: Axis label format. This supports D3 formats and not PowerBI formats as of now. Ex: 0,.3f (to format as 12,441.000) or 3s (to format as 12.4k) or 0.2%

axisLabelPrefix.description: Prefix will be added before the axis label.

axisLabelSuffix.description: Suffix will be added after axis label.

titleText.description: Text to display as title. Leave blank to compute automatically.

width.description: Percentage of available area for each column that it is allowed to fill.

barOffset.description: Determines where should the column be placed, w.r.t center. It can be any value from -100 to 100. To middle align it should be half the width.

borderWidth.description: border width of the column in px

patternType.description: Select on of the type of column pattern

showOnlyPatterns.description: Show patterns and do not fill the column with column color.

patternSize.description: Determine how spacious patterns are. Can be any value starting from 1.

textFormatType.description: Select the label units (millions, billions, etc.)

textPrecision.description: Select the number of decimal places to display for labels

text.description: Define custom format to format labels.

textConstrain.description: Switch off if you want to define custom label font size
